title: Property Data Trust Framework Claim
description: PDTF verified claims are implemented in accordance with the OpenID Connect Verified Claims model, within which the actual claims object should conform to this schema to ensure the necessary metadata is attached

schema.description: The $id of the JSONSchema against which the path and data have been generated, for example https://homebuyingandsellinggroup.co.uk/schemas/0.1.0/pdtf.json

path.description: The JSON Pointer reference to the location in the schema corresponding to the new data as defined at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6901, for example /propertyPack/propertyToBeSold/address

data.description: A JSON object representing the segment of the overall data structure which is being provided.

attribution.description: Details of any attribution, copyright or licencing requirements relating to the provided data
